class population_modeling.genome.MutationalProcesses¶

Base class for different mutational processes. Include variation of maximum lifetime, death probability and reproduction probability for the child. Spontaneous mutation happens directly with the individual.

spontaneous_mutation(self) -> None

Realize random mutation of the genome’s parameters

child_max_n(self) -> int

Realize mutation of maximum lifetime

child_p_for_death(self) -> float

Realize mutation of death probability

child_p_for_reproduction(self) -> float

Realize mutation of reproduction probability

class population_modeling.genome.NormalMutations¶

Include mutational processes based on normal distribution.

class population_modeling.population.Population(selector_: population_modeling.selector.Selector, max_life_time=5, p_for_death=0.5, p_for_reproduction=0.5)¶

A class containing information about the population. An iterator is implemented using a class Population.Iterator. Bacteria can get information about their population to adjust their behavior

selector_: Selector

an instance of the selection class that includes the initial parameters of the living conditions in the populatio

max_life_time: int

max life time of first bacteria

p_for_death: float

probability for death per iteration of first bacteria

p_for_reproduction: float

probability for reproduce 1 child per iteration of first bacteria (could be many children)

__iter__(self) -> Iterator:

get iterator of Population

draw(filename=None)¶

Drawing directed graph with reingold layout and show in png format :return: None

iteration()¶

Iteration of population. Call bacterias method @iteration@ and process children :return: self

population_modeling.population.create_graph(first_bacteria)¶

Create new graph with one node and two labels

Parameters

first_bacteria – label of the node

Returns

graph

class population_modeling.selector.ExternalFactors(antagonism=0, overpopulation=0)¶

A class of population parameters that allows you to learn about the state of the population.

With the help of this class of bacteria are able to control their size and composition. Play the role of external factors of evolution.

antagonismfloat

External factor which increases death probability

overpopulationfloat

Degree of overcrowding. Influence on reproduction probability.

class population_modeling.selector.Selector(external_factors: population_modeling.selector.ExternalFactors, have_to_die_func=<function default_have_to_die>, have_to_reproduct_func=<function default_have_to_reproduct>)¶

Simulate evolution processes. Decide what parameters should have child.

max_probabilityint

Maximum probability value

variation_probability_borderslist[float]

List of borders in which probability can variate

live_borderslist[float]

List of borders in which lifetime can variate

__probability_parameter(parent_parameter: float) -> float

Generate probability parameter based on parent’s probability
